strategy: Grey Knight armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All Grey Knight Detachments, Navy formations and the Ordo Malleus Inquisitor Retinue have an Initiative of 1+. All other formations have an initiative of 2+
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Grey Knights with Ordo Malleus allies

formations.name: Grey Knight Strike Detachment
formations.units: One Grey Knight Justicar, three Grey Knight Strike Squads plus transport

formations.name: Grey Knight Terminator Detachment
formations.units: One Grey Knight Justicar, two Grey Knight Terminators plus transport

sections.name: Grey Knight Support Detachments
sections.description: One Grey Knight Support Detachment may be fielded per Grey Knights Core Detachment

formations.name: Interceptor Detachment
formations.units: One Grey Knight Justicar, three Grey Knight Interceptor Squads

formations.name: Purgation Detachment
formations.units: One Grey Knight Justicar, two Grey Knight Purgation Squads plus transport

sections.name: Ordo Malleus Formations
sections.description: Two Ordo Malleus Formations may be taken for each Grey Knights Core Detachment

formations.name: 0-1 Ordo Malleus Inquisitor Retinue
formations.units: One Ordo Malleus Inquisitor, five Kasrkin, three Chimeras
extraUnits: Replace three Chimeras with one Crassus Assault Transport: 25 points

formations.name: Shock Trooper Platoon
extraUnits: Replace three Chimeras with one Crassus Assault Transport: 25 points

sections.name: Grey Knight Navy Formations
